00006         purpose:        Defines abstract interface for texture objects.  Texture
00007                                 objects are created & destroyed by the Renderer.

00031 #ifndef _CEGUITexture_h_
00032 #define _CEGUITexture_h_
00033 
00034 #include "CEGUIBase.h"
00035 #include "CEGUIString.h"
00036 
00037 // Start of CEGUI namespace section
00038 namespace CEGUI
00039 {
00049 class CEGUIEXPORT Texture
00050 {
00051 public:
00056     enum PixelFormat
00057     {
00059         PF_RGB,
00061         PF_RGBA
00062     };
00063 
00064         /*************************************************************************
00065                 Abstract Interface
00066         *************************************************************************/
00074         virtual ushort  getWidth(void) const = 0;
00075 
00089     virtual ushort getOriginalWidth(void) const { return getWidth(); }
00090 
00099     virtual float getXScale(void) const { return 1.0f / static_cast<float>(getOriginalWidth()); } 
00100 
00108         virtual ushort  getHeight(void) const = 0;
00109 
00122     virtual ushort getOriginalHeight(void) const { return getHeight(); }
00123 
00132     virtual float getYScale(void) const { return 1.0f / static_cast<float>(getOriginalHeight()); }
00133 
00147         virtual void    loadFromFile(const String& filename, const String& resourceGroup) = 0;
00148 
00149 
00169         virtual void    loadFromMemory(const void* buffPtr, uint buffWidth, uint buffHeight, PixelFormat pixelFormat) = 0;
00170 
00171 
00179         Renderer*       getRenderer(void) const                 {return d_owner;}
00180 
00181 
00182 protected:
00183         /*************************************************************************
00184                 Construction and Destruction
00185         *************************************************************************/
00190         Texture(Renderer* owner) : d_owner(owner) {}
00191 
00196         virtual ~Texture(void) {}
00197 
00198 private:
00199         Renderer* d_owner;              //<! Renderer object that created and owns this texture
00200 };
00201 
00202 } // End of  CEGUI namespace section
00203 
00204 #endif  // end of guard _CEGUITexture_h_
